betterquesting:10.desc:8: Punch Logs with your hands Chuck Norris style.
Reload Quest Tables.
Craft a Wooden Axe and use it to get Logs. You can also use your Axe to craft Logs into Planks.
Go fishing and you will encounter Potion Fish - Intended as an early game alternative to Potions. To get started fishing you will need to bait your hook.
The Furnace is going to be used a lot early game. You will need to turn Logs into Charcoal in order to make Torches and many other things.
Iron Ore will only give you 1 Iron Nugget after smelting. There are better ways of gathering Iron though.

After using the Ironberry Sapling or finding an Ironwood tree in the wild, you should get Ironberries from the Leaves. You can right-click them into a Crushing Tub and jump on then to turn them into Iron Berry Juice. You will then need to make a Iron Bucket to take it out of the Crushing Tub for transport.

You can now make a Drying Basin and right-click that Iron Bucket of Ironberry Juice into it. It will take some time, but the Ironberry Juice will start to dry up and leave Tiny Piles of Iron Dust behind. You can then smelt the Iron Dust into Iron Nuggets.
As you start to mine down, you will hit a point where breaking blocks becomes too much for your Stone Pick. You will need to upgrade to the new and more powerfull tools.
Once you mine even deeper, your Iron pickaxe will struggle to break stone. At this point, you will need to upgrade to a Refined Pickaxe.
The diamond Pickaxe is almost the best pickaxe you can get your hands on...
At this point your Pickaxe Lv is over 9000!

Basic Alchemy is performed in a Condenser. In order to operate a Condenser, you must have Retorts on either side, both facing towards the Condenser, so that the Retorts' tubes are attached to the Condenser. Brewing is done by putting valid ingredients into the ingredient slots, and supplying the Condenser with enough fuel, Water, and Bottles to brew.
With Basic Alchemy you can make 5 diffrent Elixirs.

Advanced Alchemy is performed in an Advanced Condenser. In order to operate an Advanced Condenser, you must have Advanced Retorts on all three sides other than the front, all facing towards the Advanced Condenser, so that the Retorts' tubes are attached to the Condenser. Brewing is done by putting valid ingredients into the ingredient slots, optionally putting a valid modifier into the modifier slot, and supplying the Advanced Condenser with enough fuel, Water, and Bottles to brew.
With Advanced Alchemy you can make 6 more Elixirs
You will not start out with a Map, but you can make one.
If you want to know your X and Z coordinates you will need to make a Compass.
The Clock now tells you the time of day.
You can right-click with he Plumb Line to see your Y coordinate.
Coal and Charcoal willl only net you 1 Torch, but there are better options available.

Torches will be hard to come by, but if you find a Beehive in a tree you can break it and use the Bee in an Apiary. This will produce Honeycombs that can be melted down to form Tallow. Tallow can then be used to make Candles. Apiaries also boost crop growth. The range of the effect is four blocks in each direction horizontally.
Zombies can be quite rewarding.

A grinder with upgrades. That's it!
 Cheers! You can now turn Ores into Dust!

 You could use a normal Furnace, but what's better than a Furnace with upgrades?
Satchels stores and collects items. Press (V) to enable auto-collect.
Hover over an upgrade to see what it does.
If you want to mine Iron Ore you will need to make a Cobblestone Pickaxe.

nEntry Requirements to this Tier
ro-Create a Crucible

rnPrimary Goals of This Tier
ro-Unknown.

rnSecondary Goals of This Tier
ro-Create Soulforged Steel and Refined Tools

rnRequirements to move to the next Tier
ro-Unknown.
Intended as an early-game alternative to Potions, Cooking the fish will increase the duration of the Potion effects.
Bouncy Bouncy, Oh such a good time, Bouncy Bouncy, Shoes all in a line.
Up, up and away! Requires Gunpowder, jump to activate.
Allows Rocket Pants to float down (cancelled by sneaking).
More effective than it seems, sometimes.

The Glider is activated by right-clicking with it, and functions when the player moves downward; i.e. if you would have been free-falling without it, you will glide instead. To deactivate the Glider, right-click again or switch to a different hotbar slot. The Hang Glider does not take damage or have durability.
The Obsidian Boat is a Lava-proof Boat that can be used to cross Lava oceans.

ViesCraft Airships is an easy-to-use mod that brings something new to Minecraft, the ability to create highly customizable Airships! All airships can be upgraded, consume fuel to fly, and have an Expansion Module system which can enhance any Airship to fit your needs! Fly your faction's colors, enhance your Airship, change your Airship's appearance, and just explore your world in style. Sky's the limit!

- Airship Balloon pronunciations: Viesdenburg [Vise-den-berg], Viesigible [Vie-sij-ible], Viesepelin [ Vie-sep-lyn], Viesakron [ Vise-ah-cron].

- Use any vanilla fuel source to power any Airship except for Buckets of Lava (by design). These items will burn for their vanilla burn times.

- The GUI for an Airship can only be accessed by the steering player while mounted in the Airship.

- When an Airship runs out of fuel, it will not be able to elevate. All motion controls becomes stiffer and slower as well as it gradually descends. Pro Tip: Don't be over Water or Lava!

- If an Airship is empty, it will float slowly at an increasing speed back to the ground. No need to worry about a fully fueled Airship taking an hour to float back down, unless an animal is in it...

- While in a multiplayer server, if you are in an Airship and log out, your Airship will disappear with you. The server restarting has no effect on this. When you log back in, you will still be in your Airship and still be flying. However, if you have any passengers and log out, they will assume control and you will drop out of the Airship when you log back in...

- Airships hate Water (unless you have the Water Landing Module active)! When you submerge it enough, it will start to smoke. If you do not get out in time, it will explode with a chance of dropping random parts. This will hurt...

To initiate gliding, the player must jump while in midair. From there, direction is controlled by looking left or right, and the gliding speed and rate of descent is controlled by looking up or down. Looking upwards while gliding temporarily increases the player's altitude, however doing this for too long stalls the player, causing them to descend at a faster rate (indicated by the player moving their limbs).

 When you're holding a Firework Rocket in your hand and gliding with an Elytra, using the Firework Rocket will boost the gliding speed, allowing you to fly. The duration or strength of the speed boost depends on the flight duration of the Firework Rocket.
The Nature's Compass is a utility item that allows you to search for a biome's location anywhere in the world and view information about it.

Iron Chests adds a variety of new chests to the game in addition to iron chests. All are better than vanilla chests in that they have more capacity and can be placed next to each other. However, they are single chests only, and cannot be combined to create double chests. Only obsidian chests have increased blast resistance.

Put your most frequently used items within convenient reach. Storage Drawers borrows ideas from Jabba and Bibliocraft, resulting in a highly functional, compact, and aesthetic storage solution that is meant to complement rather than replace those mods.

Simple Storage Network adds Cables to connect you inventories. (similiar to AE or Logistics pipes).

 The Storage Network master is the heart of your Storage Network. Storage Link Cables will connect to inventories. Storage Cables will connect the Storage Link Cables to the Storage Network Master. Storage Export Cable can export items out of the network into adjacent inventories. Storage Import Cables can import items from adjacent inventories into the network. The Storage Request Table can be connected to the storage Network Master either directly or with Storage Cables to allow access to the items connected to the Storage Network Master with a crafting grid. The Storage Remote when shift-clicked on the Storage Network Master will create a wireless link you tour Storage Request Table with a range of 64 blocks. The Advanced Storage Remote is the just like the Storage Remote but you have unlimited distance and it works across dimensions.

betterquesting:10.name:8: The Age of Wood Tier 1: Basic Mechanical Power
betterquesting:10.desc:8:
nEntry Requirements to this Age
ro-Construct a Hand Crank and Mill Stone.
lrn
Primary Goals of This Tierr
o-Collect Hemp Seeds.
-Plant a Hemp farm.
-Collect and grind enough Hemp to construct a Wind Mill.
lrn
Secondary Goals of This Tier
ro-Travel to find the overworld Nether Portals or build one by hand with Lava and Water.
ro-Construct a Cauldron and heat it with burning  Netherrack
lror
nRequirements to move to the next Tier
ro-Construct a Wind Mill.

betterquesting:10.name:8: The Age of Wood Tier 2: Continuous Mechanical Power
betterquesting:10.desc:8:
nEntry Requirements to this Age
ro-Construct a Wind Mill.
r
nPrimary Goals of This Tier
ro-Learn the basics of the mechanical power system. Kill Cows for Leather and combine it with Bark in a Cauldron to make Tanned Leather, used for making a Saw.
rn
Secondary Goals of This Tier
ro-Power your Mill Stone using the Wind Mill as a source of mechanical energy. Have some fun with Pulleys and Platforms.

rnRequirements to move to the next Tier
r-oConstruct and power a Saw.

betterquesting:10.name:8: The Age of Wood Tier 3: Automation and Basic Alchemy
betterquesting:10.desc:8:
nEntry Requirements to this Age
ro-Construct a Hopper. Visit The Nether.

rnPrimary Goals of This Tier
ro-Process Netherrack into Concentrated Hellfire.

rnSecondary Goals of This Tier
ro-Automate collection of resources at your mob-traps and farms. Learn to filter these resources so they may be sorted by type.

rnRequirements to move to the next Tier
ro-Build a Hibachi and Bellows.

betterquesting:10.name:8: The Age of Wood Tier 4: Fire Mastery
betterquesting:10.desc:8:
nEntry Requirements to this Age
ro-Build a Hibachi and Bellows.

rnPrimary Goals of This Tier
ro-Master the use of Stoked Fire. Collect Clay to create Pottery.

rnSecondary Goals of This Tier
ro-Render animal bi-products into Glue and Tallow. Start using Water Wheels as an alternative for powering your mechanical devices.

rnRequirements to move to the next Tier
ro-Build a Turntable.

betterquesting:10.name:8: The Age of Wood Tier 5: Pottery
betterquesting:10.desc:8:
nEntry Requirements to this Age
ro-Build a Turntable.

rnPrimary Goals of This Tier
ro-Learn how to use the Pottery system and create a Crucible to be used in making Soulforged Steel using the Kiln.

rnSecondary Goals of This Tier
ro-Experiment with other forms of Pottery such as the Vase and Planter.

rnRequirements to move to the next Tier
ro-Create a Crucible.

rl The kilnr is a structure built out of Brick blocks over stoked Hibachis, used to fire unfired pottery, separate End Stone into Brimstone and White Cobble and perform some Furnace recipes for free. The structure is constructed with a minimum of 4 Brick blocks, consisting of one air block enclosed on the bottom and at least 3 other sides (which includes top) by said Brick blocks. One block bellow the bottom Brick block must be a lit Hibachi stoked by a Bellows. 

 Having more than one Hibachi speeds up the progress, just like with the Cauldron. Unfired Pottery is put in the center of the Kiln and will turn into various kinds of pottery, depending on what type of unfired pottery you put in the Kiln. The important thing to note is that the Kiln is not made on a Crafting Table; it is made with Bricks in 3D. The Kiln is the only way to obtain a Crucible, which is needed for production of Steel, thus required to move upwards a tech tree.
lLearning the lay of the land

Information at your finger tips
lNo need to use normal Torches.
lThis will help in your journey through Better With Mods.
lExploration is tough without the proper tools.
